import React, { useState } from 'react' import './ExpenseItem.css' import ExpenseDate from './ExpenseDate.js' import Card from '../UI Control/Card.js' function ExpenseItem(props) { useState(props.title) let title = props.title const handleClick = () => { title = 'Changed!!' } return (

{title}

{props.amount} IDR
 ) } export default ExpenseItem
